name: Speed Run Assassin
description:
Cool action, exciting feeling
The cool battles of parkour masters give you a brand new combat experience.
Parkour masters will jump over various obstacles and dodge all kinds of bullet threats from the enemy
Eventually kill the opponent.

Gameplay
-You will play as a parkour expert and kill opponents in various obstacles
-It can roll over various obstacles and design the offensive route reasonably
-Killing opponents in a row will bring you a different experience
